{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CNet |model=CWR-854 |revision=(??) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/27/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=IIO-CWR854 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Silicon Data |cpu1_model=SD9218-BB |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=MSI MP54GS (MS-6818) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |addl_chips= |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.62.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''Wireless-G Router''
Covered models noted in the FCC test report are.. *Dual antenna models **'''CNet''' CWR-854, CWR-854V **MEG558 **EVO-W54AR **PEAB-WLG-DSL-SW4 **RT-CNL-WL-G-DSL-SW4 *Single antenna modles **WR-854 **WR-854V
Default settings (including the SSID, though it is not actually stated as the default...) are per the FCC manual.
The power supply noted in the FCC test report is a '''AHEAD''' ADC-0502000 (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 20W -> 5VDC, 2A).
